thread.title: Unite blasts ‘woefully inadequate’ government support package for Scunthorpe steelworkers (UNITE)
thread.title_full: Unite blasts ‘woefully inadequate’ government support package for Scunthorpe steelworkers (UNITE) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Unite blasts ‘woefully inadequate’ government support package for Scunthorpe steelworkers (UNITE)
text: ( Source : UNITE ) The government 's announcement of £3 million in new funding to support the steel town of Scunthorpe is 'woefully inadequate' and only deals with the symptoms not the causes of the crisis engulfing the steel industry said
